QAPair.Question: What is (are) Penis pain ?
QAPair.Answer: Penis pain is any pain or discomfort in the penis .

QAPair.Question: What causes Penis pain ?
QAPair.Answer: Causes may include: Bladder stone, Bites, either human or insect, Cancer of the penis , Erection that does not go away (priapism), Genital herpes , Infected hair follicles, Infected prosthesis of the penis, Infection under the foreskin of uncircumcised men ( balanitis ), Inflammation of the prostate gland ( prostatitis ), Injury, Peyronie disease , Reiter syndrome , Sickle cell anemia , Syphilis, Urethritis caused by chlamydia or gonorrhea , Bladder infection, Blood clot in a vein in the penis, Penile fracture,

QAPair.Question: What to do for Penis pain ?

Question.qtype: when to contact a medical professional

QAPair.Question: Do I need to see a doctor for Penis pain ?
QAPair.Answer: Contact your provider if you notice any of the following: An erection that does not go away (priapism). Seek immediate medical attention., Pain that lasts for more than 4 hours., Pain with other unexplained symptoms.,

QAPair.Question: What is the outlook for Penis pain ?
